comment: Dr. Ursits is amazing! Her assignments were very clear and helpful for building resources to use throughout my teaching career. Any time I had a question, there was no hesitation in her answers!
An easy A! There is quite a bit of work, but she lets your work in groups for most of it! She super sweet and grades fair. One of the best classes I've taken!

Dr. Ursits may be the nicest professor at KSU.  You will have a good bit of work to do and the class will provide a challenge, but she makes everything easy to understand.  Just a sweet, precious lady who is really smart about the field of education.  She gives personal feedback on everything and cares if you do well.  Take Her!

Very sweet and helpful lady! No tests or quizzes. Just observation papers, group projects and  module assignments and surveys due weekly. A lot of work but easy!! Definitely learned a lot and I enjoyed it in the process! Take her!

Great teacher! Took her for an online class and she couldn't have made it any more enjoyable. Work was graded on time and fairly. Instructions were clear and easy to find. Very personable even via an online class and always wants feedback. Lots of work but you really learn.
Great professor...one of the best I have had at KSU!
Dr. Ursits was a great teacher. Very understanding, quick feedback and comments. Easy and heavy workload in the beginning but gets better toward the end. Lots of extra credit points are offered.

Loved her class took 3313 then took her again online for 3350.  Both classes were wonderful.  When I took her for 3350 my computer had issues and I lost some of my work the night it was due.  I emailed her and she not only gave me an extension but also understood my problem.  She was the best teacher I have had so far.  Do Take if Possible!!
The nicest professor ever. Very complementary about grades. Requires a lot of group work but expectations are very clear.

I took Dr. Ursits online ECE 3350 course over the summer. Heavy workload but it goes by quickly. She is very helpful and responds to questions promptly. I recommend taking her, if you do your work it is an easy A!

You defiantly want to take her for ECE 3313. She helps to make this stressful class more fun and enjoyable. Her method of writing out lesson plans if more realistic than in EDUC 3302. I loved her so much that I am signed up to take her again for ECE 3350.
Dr. Ursits is so helpful and clear! She makes the topic fun!
Dr. Ursits is definitely one of my favorite professors! She's so nice and actually covers real life preschool situations instead of idealistic stuff from the book.

Dr. Ursits is so sweet and a great teacher! The class was super easy and she made things interesting. No tests/quizzes. Groups presented the chapters every week and we had 3 observations. Also had to do a cultural immersion paper, growth chart, and preschool class design, none of which were hard. She's an easy grader, I reccomend taking her.

Took her for pre-school..very nice lady and a lot of the class teaching each other.  I enjoyed this class and as long as you complete the assignments you will be fine.  The only thing that was hard was having to complete a full growth chart.
